extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Moodle Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Moodle installation is within the affected versions: 4.4 to 4.4.1, 4.3 to 4.3.5, 4.2 to 4.2.8, 4.1 to 4.1.11, or any earlier unsupported versions.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Moodle to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Moodle installation to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
